Collapsing of attribute (DONE)

For example, if some of the loaded scalar attributes are named Ux, Uz and Uz, the collapse into one Serie named U with itemSize = 3. The same appplies for smatrix3 (symmetric matrix3) or matrix3.

Do structured grid where we serialize/deserialize only attributes

Start with a plane and a cube
